NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

NotFoundPage.sorryPage: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to Portuguese, the URL is localized accordingly (/pt/nomes-de-caminhos).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames

Dashboard.title: Welcome to the Customer Portal Dashboard

SignatureCard.title: Signature Card
SignatureCard.description: Get expert advice on investments, bespoke support from a dedicated Executive Banker  , and 24/7 support from a dedicated Signature banker.

InfiniteCard.title: Infinite Card
InfiniteCard.description: Get expert advice on investment, 24/7 support from a dedicated Private Banker and unlimited* domestic and international airport lounge access through your bundled-in World Citizen  .

CustomerServiceLinks.helpText: Hi! How may I help you?

selfService.title: Self Service
selfService.description: Follow step by step to Register Requests and be assisted automatically to fulfill your needs.

internetBanking.title: Internet Banking
internetBanking.description: Access your account information & transactions. Pay bills and much more.

personalAccountOpening.title: Personal Account Opening
personalAccountOpening.description: Open a brand new account or an additional account, conveniently and efficiently from your device.

quiqChatBanking.title: Quiq Chat Banking
quiqChatBanking.description: Fast and conversational way to perform bank transactions. Say 'Hello' to start chatting.

BotsService.helpText: Select a service to get started

nationalTransfers.title: National and International Transfers
nationalTransfers.description: Obtain proof of transfer quickly and securely.

accountDetailsLetter.description: Request and receive your account details letter.

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Obtain stamped proof of your payments.

statementsAndBalance.title: Statements and Balance
statementsAndBalance.description: Request a detailed account statement and balance.
